package.json.description: Next.js 15.5.9 project with React 19, TypeScript 5.7, Tailwind CSS 3.4. Scripts: dev, build, start, lint.

src/types/project.ts.description: Core TypeScript type definitions for the project dashboard. Contains: Project (main entity), GitInfo (git status), ProjectStatus (union type), ProjectSummary (lightweight view), ProjectListResponse/ProjectDetailResponse (API wrappers), ProjectErrorResponse (error handling).

src/lib/project-scanner.ts.description: Project scanner module with scanDirectory function for discovering projects. Uses fs/promises (readdir, stat, access). Key exports: scanDirectory, scanProjects, getProjectsPath, filterSuccessfulScans, filterScanErrors. Returns ScanResult[] which is a union of ProjectScanResult | ProjectScanError.

src/app/api/projects/route.ts.description: GET /api/projects endpoint - fetches all projects from configured directory with Git info. Uses scanProjects(), filterSuccessfulScans(), enrichProjectsWithGitInfo(). Returns ProjectListResponse with projects sorted by lastModified desc.

src/app/api/projects/[id]/route.ts.description: GET /api/projects/[id] endpoint - fetches single project by ID with Git info. Uses scanProjects(), finds project by ID, enriches with getGitStatus(). Returns ProjectDetailResponse with project and fetchedAt timestamp. Handles 404 for non-existent projects with proper error codes.

src/lib/actions.ts.description: Server actions module with 'use server' directive. Key exports: refreshProjects() (rescans and revalidates), getProjectsFresh() (bypasses cache), refreshProject() (revalidates single project). Uses revalidatePath() for cache invalidation. Custom types: RefreshResult, FetchProjectsResult.

src/components/project-card.tsx.description: ProjectCard component for displaying projects in grid/list views. Features: viewMode prop (grid/list), StatusBadge integration, Git branch display, relative time formatting, package.json/README indicators, Link to detail pages. Uses React.forwardRef pattern. Helper function formatRelativeTime() for date formatting.

src/components/project-table.tsx.description: ProjectTable component for tabular project listing. Features: status badges column, project name with description, Git branch display, uncommitted changes count (amber badge), relative time formatting, package.json/README indicators. Uses shadcn/ui Table components. Supports empty state, custom messages, and row click handlers. Clickable rows link to /projects/[id] detail pages.
